name: CRISPR Bob
description:
Made in 3 days for the LudumDare 47, under the theme "stuck in a loop".

Help a Programmable Unicellular Creature (BOB) survive in the micro-cosmos. Elegance is key, so try to use the simplest of programs.

Controls:
Arrows to plan movements, Space to launch the simulation, Backspace to undo the movements.

Credits:
@nodli: concept, level design & audio
@titwin: implementation (ui and game feel)
@solroo: design & implementation
@janxelod: implementation persistence
Icons from https://game-icons.net/
